text:
@realDonaldTrump You lied about unemployment number. True numbrr after correction is 16.5%. You lie,lie lie. You have destroyed our economy, over 110,000 Americans  dead b/c of delayed Covid-19 response. We all know you are out to destroy us. You only have 38% of Americans with you.
#VoteBlue
